item.description:
This is the 3rd year in a row we're posting this for group members Karen and Lisa!  COme join us for the annual Betty Boobs Fundraising party! 

PLEASE contact Karen or Lisa for ticket information!!

**Please note, I may not personally be able to make it to this event due to my own current health issues.  It is a daytime decision.  Please look for the group to all meetup.

Fundraising Night for Avon Walk for Breast Cancer
Emerald Hall, VFW Hall in Abington, 30 Central Street, Abington, MA, 7:00 pm - midnight

Tickets: $30. per person $250. for Table of (10) DJ Alex of The Downtown Sound, Catered Dinner Buffet.
Many donations from local area businesses. Raffles and silent auction!!
... If you can not attend please click to donate:

http://www.avonwalk.org/goto/kmosman

Massage Envy from Quincy - major, generous sponsor! as well as Fat Cactus in Randolph!! Thank you both so much!! Quincy Athletic Club has also provided us a prize!! It's going to be a great time!!!!! Tables are selling!! What's your table name??
Thank you to Studio 21 from Taunton for the amazing gift of printing! What a huge help!!! Wait until you see what they did with the design Joann Evans-Mason did!! talk about a team effort!!
Alex and Ani bracelet! O'Donnells, Fred's Seafood and Zack's Pizza!
Many... many... more....$30. per person $250. for Table of (10)

group.name: The South Shore Fitness Meetup Group

item.name: Betty Boobs Fundraising Party for Avon Breast cancer Walk
